data.actual_result: Mentions are in bold by default, preventing bold markdown from having any effect
data.expected_result: Mentions should not be in bold by default, so you can use markdown to bold them if you want
data.short_description: Unlike Desktop client, mentions are bolded by default
data.steps_to_repro: - Send a mention - Send a normal text - Send a bolded text - Compare font weight of texts between each other and between the desktop client
